attributes.action: bring the railway back under goverment control
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i want to petition the pm to bring the railways back under goverment control so that they are accountable for anything that goes wrong for to long these private companies are passing  the buck for fatal errors in track  maintance this should stop now we pay through the nose to travel on the rail network the least we expect is to get from a/b in one piece

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
